section.name: Local Test Servers
section.p: We have 3 test servers at Caret, being build with trunk head from source.sakaiproject.org and the head of our local Sakai 2.1 branch from saffron.caret.cam.ac.uk for the Sakai RWiki tool.
If you need to test on the Sakai Project nightly servers or the QA Build servers Do not use these servers
Note, these servers are rebuilt every night, and data on these servers may not be kept between rebuilds.
